briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Eslicarbazepine Acetate as Adjunctive Therapy for Partial Seizures in Elderly Patients
officialTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Eslicarbazepine Acetate (ESL) as Adjunctive Therapy for Partial Seizures in Elderly Patients
summary: This is an open Label study to investigate the safety and efficacy of eslicarbazepine acetate as adjunctive therapy for partial seizures in elderly patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Reported Adverse Events (AE)
